headline: Meteora Gave Trump Team $4.2M Airdrop Hours After Founder Sued for Memecoin Scams
summary: Three addresses linked to the Trump team received a $4.2 million airdrop of $MET tokens from Meteora just hours after a federal class-action lawsuit accused the protocol’s co-founder, Benjamin Chow, of orchestrating pump-and-dump schemes using Trump family endorsements. Blockchain analytics firm Arkham Intelligence identified the recipients as the TRUMP token ...
